item.title: R Markdown Test
item.description: Overview Hey. Just testing the Rmd funcitonality of this page. Maybe I’m interested in the BMI of human star wars characters. Maybe. Let’s see how this goes: library(dplyr) library(ggplot2) starwars %>% filter(species == "Human") %>% ggplot(aes(y=height, x=mass, colour=species)) + geom_point() + geom_smooth() + theme_bw() + ggtitle("Starwars BMI")
